item.title: Naive Bayes
item.description: Naive Bayesian is a classifier using Bayes’ theorem with ‘naive’ assumptioins. Suppose we are solving a classification problem, with features denoted as $\mathbf X$, and class results as $\mathbf Y$. We would like to train a classifier for the class results given some feature values. Bayes’ theorem tells us the probability $$ \begin{equation} P(\mathbf Y \mid \mathbf X) = \frac{ P(\mathbf X \mid \mathbf Y) P(\mathbf Y) }{ P(\mathbf X) }.
